document.title: Scope and Sequence   Grade 5  Visual Arts Supplement

D3614C797D014F5EBBBD14CF251EE823.description: Examine and show how media artworks form meanings, situations, and cultural experiences (for example, news, cultural events).

20FA7898A678436CB83471A8C1CB2A4C.description: Identify how art is used to inform or change beliefs, values, or behaviors of an individual or society

2E264BB1AD1347B78700682D0566FE54.description: Determine and compare personal and group interpretations of a variety of media artworks, considering their subject matter, media characteristics, and context.

DCAFAD2249314794AC7D99550555EA58.description: Interpret art through describing and analyzing feelings, subject matter, formal characteristics, artmaking approaches, and contextual information

C75F8429038E475D8448F1A1FAEE66B0.description: Compare qualities and purposes of presentation formats and fulfill a role and associated processes in presentation and/or distribution of media artworks.

F70408D2BCC04C6C99894624077AB4A1.description: Define the roles and responsibilities of a curator, explaining the skills and knowledge needed in preserving, maintaining, and presenting objects, artifacts and artwork

DB0CFA22ADF44312B8881E80320666CD.description: Examine how tools and techniques could be used in standard and experimental ways in constructing media artworks

212BA942DAA843D7B8446CA2D5FCE4BD.description: Experiment and develop skills in multiple art-making techniques and approaches through practice.

89330D5C8F204FE699CBE270DEBDFEB0.description: Develop, present, and experiment with ideas, plans, models, and proposals for media arts productions, considering the artistic goals and audience.

C76FEE0459AA43DA81A1881566E96C5D.description: Identify and demonstrate diverse methods of artistic investigation to choose an approach for beginning a work of art

CBED4FADC9814D1EBFAB9A9EAFF2507A.description: Envision original ideas and innovations for media artworks using personal experiences and/or the work of others.

B7417FBF931748489DFDB3C3D3D59FCB.description: Combine ideas to generate an innovative idea for art making.
